scripts.css-compile: node-sass --include-path $(cd .. && bundle show bootstrap)/assets/stylesheets --include-path ../assets/stylesheets --output-style expanded --source-map true --source-map-contents true --precision 6 ../assets/stylesheets/nest.scss assets/css/nest.css
